name: Percentage of Users
description: What percentage of users were in this category?

name: Number of Users
description: What total number of users was in this category?

name: UI item
description: Name of the toolbar button or menu item used.

name: Number of Actions
description: Number of times UI item was used.

name: Operating System
description: Was the user on Windows, Mac, or Linux?

name: Firefox Version
description: What version of Firefox was the user running?

name: Number of Extensions
description: How many extensions did this user have?

name: Locale
description: What was the user's Firefox locale setting?

name: Menu bar setting
description: Did the user have the menu bar shown or hidden?

name: Bookmark bar setting
description: Did the user have the bookmarks bar shown or hidden?

name: Status bar setting
description: Did the user have the status bar shown or hidden?

name: Tab bar setting
description: Did the user have tabs on the top or on the bottom?
